      • addAttempt

        public Attempt addAttempt​(org.bson.types.ObjectId assignmentId,
                          org.bson.types.ObjectId submitterId,
                          java.nio.file.Path attemptArchive)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        A method that adds an attempt for the given assignment by the given student
        Parameters:
        assignmentId - The assignment that is attempted
        submitterId - The submitter of this attempt
        attemptArchive - A ZIP archive of the attempt (contents of the src directory)
        Returns:
        The newly created Attempt
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If processing the archive fails
